moves.name: Counter
moves.notes: when counter activates, hitbox active frames 14-20 (delayed by 1 frame if stronger move)

moves.name: Up Smash
moves.notes: weak hit has half the shieldstun

moves.name: Down Smash
moves.notes: active frame 5-7, 20-22, weak hit has 6 frames shieldstun

moves.name: Neutral Air
moves.notes: active frame 6-7, 15-21, weakhit has half the shieldstun

moves.name: Dolphin Slash
moves.notes: strong hit frame 5, can do 10 or 13% damage. weak hit frames 6-11, does 7 or 6% damage

moves.name: Shield Breaker
moves.notes: minimum charge time 11 frames, maximum 121. hitbox active frames 5-10 after releasing charge

moves.name: Dolphin Slash (Air)
moves.notes: strong hit frame 5, can do 10 or 13% damage. weak hit frames 6-11, does 7 or 6% damage
